mapper.select: SELECT * FROM review WHERE PD_CODE = #{pdc} ORDER BY review_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (review_id, review_title, review_content, user_id, pd_code, create_date) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(review_id), 0) + 1 FROM review WHERE pd_code = #{pdCode}), #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, #{userId}, #{pdCode}, SYSDATE )
